job_title: Project Manager WITH IOS AND Android
jd: Hello,Role: Project Manager WITH IOS AND Android Location: Irvine, CA | Onsite MUST NEED 10+ YEARS EXPERIENCE AND VISA H1B AND H4EAD MUST HAVE IOS AND ANDROID EXPERIENCE Ideally should have past experience with Mobile apps ( iOS / Android) / B2B SAAS applicationsstrong Product skills needed, being able to create and manage mobile product roadmap, clearly understand articulate the problem statement, lead discovery of initiatives , capture requirements and create PRD’s.work with UX design teams, engineering and cross functional teams for solutioning.responsible for coordination with business stakeholders from C10 countries working through UAT launches, rollouts and post rollout support.strong communication skillsmanage Mobile Agile scrum teams - Manage healthy product backlog, run groomings, sprint planningsstrong documentation skills with Confluence,JIRAResponsible for doing competitive analysis and work with research team to understand the customer needs and create a roadmap based on that.Personality Traits- Product mentality (asks questions, probes to understand the problem statement and the use cases, needs to have a sense of ownership and urgency.
